metadata.title: Corruptbox Incredibox
metadata.description: Experience the mind-bending world of Corruptbox 2 but Sprunki Mod. A surreal musical journey into digital chaos and creativity.
metadata.keywords: Corruptbox, Incredibox, Sprunki Mod, Digital Art, Experimental Music, Glitch Art

hero.title: Welcome to Corruptbox
hero.description: Dive into a surreal digital realm where music meets chaos

items.title: What is Corruptbox?
items.description: Corruptbox is a mind-bending musical experience that combines glitch art with interactive sound creation. It's a unique platform where players can create music through corrupted digital interfaces and distorted visuals.

items.title: What's special about the Sprunki Mod?
items.description: The Sprunki Mod takes the original Corruptbox experience and enhances it with quirky characters, distorted visuals, and unpredictable gameplay elements. It creates a unique blend of digital horror and musical experimentation.

items.title: How do I play?
items.description: Simply click 'Play Now' to begin. You'll be able to interact with various glitched characters, each producing unique sounds. Combine these elements to create your own haunting musical compositions.

items.title: Is it free to play?
items.description: Yes, Corruptbox is free to play directly in your web browser. No downloads or installations required.

brand.title: Corruptbox
brand.description: A surreal journey into digital chaos and musical creativity
